Whether your goal is wealth succession planning, tax planning, asset accumulation, family banking,
or simply wanting a more prudent plan.

Our team can advise you on the best trust structure to meet your needs.

Private Trust Services
Investment Optimization
Succession
Planning
Family Office Services

Private Trust Services

A trust is a legal arrangement whereby one party (the custodian) transfers its assets and its legal title to another party (the trustee) to hold and manage them for the benefit of the custodian himself and/or other parties (the beneficiaries). As a licensed and insured trust company, FGA Trust brings a wealth of experience in managing trusts and a contractual obligation to put the best interests of the trust beneficiaries first. In accordance with the trustee’s instructions and objectives, this obligation includes managing the trust to protect and grow its assets and to use those assets solely for the benefit of the beneficiaries.

 

Simply stated, a trust can be classified according to two major attributes: (1) whether it is revocable; and (2) whether it was created while the trustee was alive. A trustee can change a revocable trust, but cannot change an irrevocable trust. Therefore, a living trust is created by the custodian while he or she is alive. Otherwise, it is a willed trust, created by the provisions of the principal’s will, and exists only after the principal’s death.

Wealth Management

Wealth Protection – Effectively isolate assets from creditors and ensure strict confidentiality of assets. Avoid freezing of assets.

Wealth Succession – Flexible long-term planning, effective succession, and avoidance of probate.

Family Governance – Develop core family values.

Tax Planning – Implementing the most effective tax arrangements.

Trust Administration

We will manage your trust to meet your needs while giving priority to the interests of your beneficiaries.







Escrow Services

Facilitating commercial transactions, including acquisitions, mergers, sale and purchase agreements, private placements and debt securities issuances, FGA Trust can act as escrow agent and hold assets in escrow until the counterparty fulfills its obligations.

Proof of Wealth

   Proof of Account Balance
   Proof of customer account/service information
  Proof of non-routine information
   Trust account statements for asset verification

Professional Executors

  Collect, evaluate and take possession of all assets
  Execute appropriate purchases and sales
  Settlement of debts and payment of claims
  Preparation of tax returns and detailed final accounts
   Distributions and estate settlements

Investment Optimization

Are your investment opportunities limited to publicly traded stocks, real estate and bonds? Most investors’ investment opportunities are limited by location, resources, knowledge and accessibility.

 

FGA Trust is not an investment advisor, but we can certainly open doors and break down barriers for our clients. Working with our team of experienced professionals and partners, we can introduce clients to global opportunities to invest directly in multi-jurisdictional hedge funds, private equity, and listed and unlisted products, subject to jurisdiction-specific mandated investment restrictions. Depending on the specific circumstances of the trust, we can manage trust funds ourselves, outsource the investment of trust funds to a registered investment advisor, or even establish an investment committee to involve trust members in overall portfolio strategy and allocation decisions.

 

Whether your investment objective is to embrace social impact, get involved in the next big thing, or simply seek above-average returns or reduce risk through diversification, we will help you rethink your traditional investment model by leveraging our entrepreneurial background.

Offers a variety of private placement or direct investment opportunities

Succession Planning

Passing on significant wealth and legacy to future generations is a critical part of any family’s financial strategy. To ensure a smooth transfer of your financial estate, you need dedicated succession planning services to help you protect your assets while preserving financial confidentiality to ensure.

We make it our business to protect, preserve and plan for our customers’ personal and family wealth. With a depth of knowledge across many professional disciplines, our team can provide a seamless and holistic approach to the challenges and opportunities of succession planning. Our team and network of advisers will provide you with the legal, accounting and tax advice that our customers deserve. We will also work with any advisors which you prefer.

Our partnership service model is built on long-term personal relationships that are founded on a deep understanding of what truly matters to you both now and in the future. We understand and will delicately cater for unique family sensitivities when dealing with the second and third generations of our customer families.

Our Service

Family Office Services

FGA Trust specializes in providing customized, professional and independent services to private clients. A global team of experienced professionals and a network of quality partners will work tirelessly to empower ultra-high net worth families to successfully preserve, grow and transfer their clients’ estates across generations and market economic cycles.

The independence and private wealth expertise of the FGA Trust eliminates any friction or conflicts of interest, dependence and high costs associated with having these institutions manage the administrative affairs and investment options of their clients.

Quality services and networks enable FGA Trust to address complex issues while providing insight and solutions to the challenges facing private clients today.

By delivering impartial advice in the areas of governance, succession, investment, reporting and financial solution based on the family’s long-term needs and plans, we partner with our clients to address important challenges including:

Ensuring your family’s long-term success

We advise on policies and plans to ensure a smooth transition and distribution of wealth and businesses to maintain family harmony.

Building the right structures

We assist you in the designing, building and optimization of the family office architecture by providing the appropriate investment and transaction platform to elevate your family business’ wealth dynamic.

Wealth Management

As a licensed Trustee, we will manage your family’s investments in line with your objectives and wishes. We provide guidance in developing policies, strategies, processes, and committees. To serve you better, our vast network of esteemed partners will offer you with investment opportunities across different asset classes and jurisdictions.
